CustomField.description: Different colour check marks will be visible depending upon the Elevation type record present on the case object.
CustomField.formula:
IF($Setup.Channel_Partner_Profile_Settings__c.Is_Channel_Partner__c, IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( Work_Order__r.Account_Elevation__c ) ) , NOT( ISBLANK( Work_Order__r.Technical_Elevation__c ) )), IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_550, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_550))+"resource/1639462150000/RedCheckMark?","Account and Technical Elevation Records are present"), IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Work_Order__r.Technical_Elevation__c ) ) , IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_550, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_550))+"resource/BlueCheckMark?","Technical Elevation Record Present") ,
IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Work_Order__r.Account_Elevation__c ) ) , IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_550, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_550))+"resource/OrangeCheckMark?", "Account Elevation Record Present") , "") ) ), IF( AND( NOT( ISBLANK( Work_Order__r.Account_Elevation__c ) ) , NOT( ISBLANK( Work_Order__r.Technical_Elevation__c ) )), IMAGE("/resource/1639462150000/RedCheckMark?","Account and Technical Elevation Records are present"),
IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Work_Order__r.Technical_Elevation__c ) ) , IMAGE("/resource/BlueCheckMark?", "Technical Elevation Record Present") ,
IF( NOT( ISBLANK( Work_Order__r.Account_Elevation__c ) ) , IMAGE("/resource/OrangeCheckMark?", "Account Elevation Record Present") , "") ) ))
CustomField.label: Elevated
